common.loginPromptText: Please sign up or log in to MIDATA to store your data.

questionOfTheDay.noAnswer: Please answer the question before saving.
questionOfTheDay.thankYou: Thank you for your response. The next question will follow soon.

healthStatus.thankYou: Thank you for your contribution. It would be very helpful if you would enter your health status twice a week.

dataset.subtitle: FHIR Implementation Guide COVID-19 PROM Dataset
dataset.title: Data set specification

editor.title: Publisher of the app and secure data repository

sponsors.subtitle: Sponsors and partners have no privileged access to the data.
sponsors.title: Sponsors and partners

standard.subtitle: FHIR® is the registered trademark of HL7 and is used with the permission of HL7. Use of the FHIR trademark does not constitute endorsement of this product by HL7.
standard.title: Standard

community.text: Become a member of the community and support the fight against the pandemic with your anonymous data.
community.title: Together against the coronavirus!

dataSharing.text: Enter your health status and further information about COVID-19 twice a week.
dataSharing.title: Donate data

measures.text: Follow the measures of the Confederation and take responsibility – Keep your distance.
measures.title: Social Distancing

notifications.text: Please allow notifications so we can remind you when it's time to collect data again.

research.text: Your data will be made anonymously available to the Open Data community.
research.title: Enable research

notifications.information: Reminders appear only if no symptoms have been entered in the selected interval.

situation.complete: Don't forget to update your answers if your situation changes.
situation.incomplete: You didn't answer at least one question, don't you want to do this now?
situation.thankYou: Thank you for entering your personal situation.
situation.title: Personal situation
